item.title: Custom Images in WordPress – Getting your own thumbnail
item.description: In WordPress, images are automatically re-saved in different sizes like creating a thumbnail. But what happens if you want to use your own image? or want a different size? Note: each image will also get a custom class added called dsimage … this means you can style it.
